item.title: MCP Servers: The USB-C Moment for AI Agents
item.author: srbsharma8@gmail.com (Saurabh Sharma)
item.description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) is fast becoming the universal connector for AI agents, enabling a modular, secure, and rapidly growing ecosystem of tools. Here’s why it matters—and what it unlocks. Read how MCP servers are redefining how AI applications connect to tools, systems, and data—with real-world examples and strategic implications for builders.
